headline: The Bull Case For Graphic Packaging (GPK) Could Change Following CEO Shake-Up And Activist Backlash – Learn Why
summary: Graphic Packaging Holding Company recently replaced long-standing CEO Michael P. Doss with incoming CEO Robbert E. Rietbroek, a consumer-products veteran with extensive global leadership experience across Primo Brands, PepsiCo, Kimberly-Clark, and Procter & Gamble. The abrupt transition has drawn sharp public criticism from major shareholder Eminence Capital, which is calling for Doss’s reinstatement and the resignation of board chair Philip Martens over governance concerns. We’ll now...
